name: Inflatable Ducks - GGJ2017
description:
Inflatable Ducks is a puzzle game in water. Touch the water to send waves and flip all the ducks back up !

This game was made in 46h for the Global Game Jam 2017. I was only able to make three levels during the event so it's mostly a proof of concept.

Code and art made by me.

You can contact me @i208iN .

Instructions (Windows Only)
Unzip the folder and open InflatableDucks.exe. Always keep the other folder next to this file.

PS: I forgot to put an exit button inside the levels, so you'll have to finish them or exit the program. Whoops !

PPS: Whoops n°2. The exit button doesn't work in the main menu.
